SEARCH

Class Round

java.lang.Object
Round
public class Round extends Object
The `Round` class represents a round of Uno card game. It manages player actions, card interactions, and gameplay rules for a single round.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ajen, Jason, Zarif, Arun

  • Constructor Details

    • Round

      public Round(ArrayList<Player> players)
      Constructor for the `Round` class. Initializes the round with a list of players, a deck, and a discard pile.
      Parameters:
      players - The list of players participating in the round.

  • Method Details

    • distributeHand

      public void distributeHand()
      Distributes a fixed number of cards to each player's hand at the beginning of the round.

    • playRound

      public void playRound()
      Plays a round of the Uno game. Manages player turns, card plays, special card effects, and checks for a winner.

    • askUser

      public int askUser(Player currentPlayer)
      Asks the current player for a card to play.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected card to play or draw (last index).

    • myDraw

      public void myDraw(int cardToPlay)
      Handles drawing a card from the deck based on the player's choice.
      Parameters:
      cardToPlay - The player's choice for playing or drawing a card.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(int n)
      Handles drawing a specified number of cards for a player.
      Parameters:
      n - The number of cards to draw.

    • playCard

      public Card playCard(int cardToPlay)
      Plays a card from the player's hand and adds it to the discard pile.
      Parameters:
      cardToPlay - The index of the card to be played from the player's hand.
      Returns:
      The card that was played.

    • checkCard

      public boolean checkCard(Card card1, Card card2)
      Checks if a card can be played based on Uno card game rules.
      Parameters:
      card1 - The card to be checked for playability.
      card2 - The card at the top of the discard pile.
      Returns:
      True if the card can be played, false otherwise.

    • reverse

      public void reverse()
      Reverses the order of players in the game.

    • wildCard

      public void wildCard(Card card)
      Handles the selection of a color for a Wild card.
      Parameters:
      card - The Wild card for which the color is selected.

    • checkWinner

      public boolean checkWinner()
      Checks if any player has won the round by emptying their hand.
      Returns:
      True if a player has won, false otherwise.

    • getTotalPoints

      public int getTotalPoints()
      Calculates the total points for the round based on the remaining cards in players' hands.
      Returns:
      The total points for the round.
